name: rsi_oversold
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Fetches a list of stocks that have an RSI oversold signal from the specified API endpoint.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.
